channel.title: ID Preservation on The AI Talks
channel.description: Recent content in ID Preservation on The AI Talks

item.title: InstantID: Zero-shot Identity-Preserving Generation in Seconds
item.description: Speaker Haofan Wang is a research engineer at Xiaohongshu, working primarily on controllable and conditional content generation. Before that, he worked at MMU, Kuaishou. He obtained master degree from CMU in December 2020. His featured works inlcude InstantID and Score-CAM. Abstract There has been significant progress in personalized image synthesis with methods such as Textual Inversion, DreamBooth, and LoRA. Yet, their real-world applicability is hindered by high storage demands, lengthy fine-tuning processes, and the need for multiple reference images.
